review: I bought the Fire TV Stick over Chromecast mostly for the features of phone remote app and mirroring. Neither one works. Did the trouble shooting suggestions from Amazon over and over to no avail. While looking for answers on the internet I came across many other complaints about these features which I wish I saw before purchasing this. It did connect to my network fast and easy, and is good for watching Netflix and Hulu etc., but that is it. I hear some people had luck with the other features, but apparently it is hit or miss, mostly miss. Buyer Beware.
